item.description:
Join CTMatch.com on Sunday Night at Cugino's for the Sunday Night Dance Party Italian Style
- with a full Italian Buffet from Cugino's and Dance Music

CTMatch.com will have a private section, so join us and our CTMatch.com friends.
Meet Someone Special and Dance The Night Away!

Dance Party and Italian Buffet start at 6:30pm

CUGINOS Italian Restaurant
1410 Highland Ave (Route 10)
Cheshire, CT 06410
(203) 250-7037

Exit 3 off 691

Tickets are $15 and includes Italian Buffet
Advance Ticket Discount - only $10

Visit http://www.CTMatch.co... or CLICK HERE

Call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the CTMatch.com section inside

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Join CTMatch.com on Sunday Night at Cugino's for the Sunday Night Dance Party
